content.value: public class XunitTestClassRunnerBaseContext<TTestClass, TTestCase> : TestClassRunnerContext<TTestClass, TTestCase>, IAsyncLifetime, IAsyncDisposable where TTestClass : class, IXunitTestClass where TTestCase : class, IXunitTestCase

Public Class XunitTestClassRunnerBaseContext(Of TTestClass As {Class, IXunitTestClass}, TTestCase As {Class, IXunitTestCase}) Inherits TestClassRunnerContext(Of TTestClass, TTestCase) Implements IAsyncLifetime, IAsyncDisposable

inheritedMembers.summary: Gets the aggregator used for reporting exceptions.
